title: Little Devil
description: The children have already been on holiday for a week and Elizabeth is bored. Her brother, Jason, and cousin, Jasmine, aren't taking much notice of her, and all her friends seem to be away. Elizabeth really wishes that something exciting would happen. That's when an unexpected visitor arrives. He's got two horns, a tail, and the ability to grant almost any wish. For Elizabeth, Jason and Jasmine this looks like it is going to be the most exciting summer ever!But a word of sometimes you should be careful what you wish for ... ***
author: Simone Solon
